title: signal_detector

controller_id.description: Required. Foreign key to signal_controller table.

signal_phase_num.description: Required. Number of the associated phase.

link_id.description: Foreign key. The link covered by the detector.

start_lane.description: Left-most lane covered by the detector.

end_lane.description: Right-most lane covered by the detector (blank if only one lane).

ref_node_id.description: The detector is on the approach to this node.

det_zone_lr.description: Required. Distance from from the stop bar to detector.

det_zone_front.description: Optional. Linear reference of front of detection zone.

det_zone_back.description: Optional. Linear reference of back of detection zone.

description: A signal detector is associated with a controller, a phase and a group of lanes.
